function PROFILE_HandleRatings (   Username,
  RatingNodes 
)

Create an array with ratings and return it.

Parameters:
Username User's name
RatingNodes Array of ratings with data
Returns:
Array in format: each line is a rating type [1] lightning [2] blitz [3] Standard each column is a data [1] category [2] current rating [3] max rating [4] max rating date [5] number of games in category [6] number of wins [7] number of losses [8] numeber of draws
See also:
CONTACT_HandleInfo(XML);
Author:
Danilo Yorinori
